docs.title: IT Base
docs.text:
Welcome to your personal knowledge base. Use this site to collect notes about programming and much more.

  • Quick search with the magnifier in the top bar
  • Dark, distraction-free reading
  • Copy code buttons on code blocks

Get started by exploring the sections in the left navigation.

docs.title: Pandas
docs.text:
Handy Pandas recipes.

import pandas as pd

# Read CSV and preview
(df := pd.read_csv("data.csv")).head()

docs.title: SQL
docs.text:
Common SQL patterns and tips.

-- Top N per group (PostgreSQL)
SELECT DISTINCT ON (user_id) *
FROM events
ORDER BY user_id, created_at DESC;

docs.title: Docker
docs.text:
Common Docker commands and patterns.

# Build and run
docker build -t myapp .
docker run --rm -p 8080:8080 myapp

docs.title: Git
docs.text:
Useful Git commands.

# Show a one-line log
git log --oneline --graph --decorate --all

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: Useful links and references to explore later.

docs.title: Programming Overview
docs.text: This section collects core programming concepts, language notes, and reusable snippets.

docs.title: JavaScript
docs.text:
Notes and snippets for JavaScript.

// Example: optional chaining
const city = user?.address?.city ?? "Unknown";

docs.title: Python
docs.text:
Tips, patterns, and snippets for Python.

# Example: f-string formatting
name = "World"
print(f"Hello, {name}!")

docs.title: Tips & Snippets
docs.text:
Short, copyable snippets for daily work.

Bash 
# Find large files
find . -type f -size +50M -print0 | xargs -0 ls -lh
Git 
# Amend last commit message
git commit --amend -m "Better message"
